headline: Ex-Lazard Banker Charged in Insider Trading Case Tied to Health-Care Deals
summary: US authorities accuse a former Lazard banker of tipping health-care mergers that generated about $41 million in illegal profits.

headline: JPM26: HIV pipeline dosing optionality gives Gilead advantage
summary: Speaking at the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference 2026, CEO Daniel O’Day said that the company has seven pipeline drugs for HIV.
